test-method.name: loginValidDriverID
test-method.description: Scenario: Login with valid Driver ID on Mobile - Given a mobile user exists with a valid Driver ID - When the user logs in with correct credentials - Then the login should be successful - And the user dashboard should be displayed

test-method.name: loginInvalidDriverID
test-method.description: Scenario: Login with invalid Driver ID on Mobile - Given a mobile user enters an invalid Driver ID - When the user attempts to log in - Then an error message should be displayed indicating the user does not exist

test-method.name: loginInvalidOtp
test-method.description: Scenario: Login with invalid OTP on Mobile - Given a mobile user has requested an OTP - When the user enters an invalid or expired OTP - Then an error message should be shown indicating the OTP is invalid or expired
